summary: This is a brief internal email authorizing a detective to retrieve Jeffrey Epstein's case file from the Office of the Chief Medical Examiner (OCME). It indicates an official request for autopsy or death-related records.

persons.name: Nick Detective
persons.context: The detective is tasked with and authorized to retrieve Jeffrey Epstein's OCME case file.

persons.name: M G.
persons.context: Appears as a recipient copied on the email, likely another law enforcement or agency official.

connections.description: Both are recipients/parties on an internal email regarding the retrieval of the Epstein OCME file.

events.title: Authorization to Retrieve Epstein OCME File
events.description: A detective named Nick is tasked and authorized to retrieve Jeffrey Epstein's case file from the Office of the Chief Medical Examiner.

keyFacts: An internal email authorizes a detective to retrieve Jeffrey Epstein's OCME (Office of the Chief Medical Examiner) case file.
The document indicates official law enforcement interest in Epstein's death-related records.
The email is addressed to 'cas' and copied to 'M G.', suggesting a coordinated request within an agency.
